Package org.apache.hama.util

Common utilities.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BSPNetUtils
    NetUtils for our needs.
    BSPServletUtil  
    Bytes
    Utility class that handles byte arrays, conversions to/from other types, comparisons, hash code generation, manufacturing keys for HashMaps or HashSets, etc.
    Bytes.ByteArrayComparator
    Byte array comparator class.
    ClusterUtil  
    ClusterUtil.GroomServerThread
    Data Structure to hold GroomServer Thread and GroomServer instance
    DistCacheUtils  
    KryoSerializer  
    LRUCache<K,V>
    Simple LinkedHashMap based LRU Cache for specified capacity.
    ProgramDriver
    A driver that is used to run programs added to it
    RandomVariable
    The RandomVaraibale Class provides static methods for generating random numbers.
    ReflectionUtils
    Refelction utility for BSP programmes.
    RunJar
    Run a Hama job jar.
    SocketInputStream
    This implements an input stream that can have a timeout while reading.
    SocketOutputStream
    This implements an output stream that can have a timeout while writing.
    VersionInfo
    A version information class.
    ZKUtil
